name: What’s for Dessert? Chocolate Cream Pudding Pie
description: Easy, creamy, and delicious. Try bringing this to your next block party!

ingredients.name: vanilla or chocolate graham wafer crumbs

preparation: Stir graham wafer crumbs with butter. Press over bottom and part-way up the side of a pie dish.
Using an electric mixer, whip cream with sugar, orange zest, and vanilla extract until soft peaks form.
Beat Chocolate Pudding with one-third of the whipped cream. Gently fold in remaining whipped cream until no streaks remain.
Turn mixture into pie crust and smooth top. Freeze for at least 2 hours or until firm. Top with mocha beans before serving, if desired.
